00017 template <class Key, class CacheObject, class SourceObject>
00018 class TMorphLockedProducerBase: public TILockedProducer<Key, CacheObject>
00019 {
00020 public:
00021        TMorphLockedProducerBase();
00022 
00023        double GetMaxCumulatedWeight() const;
00024        void SetMaxCumulatedWeight(double value);
00025 
00026        // reimplemented (iproc::TILockedProducer)
00027        virtual const CacheObject* ProduceLockedObject(const Key& key);
00028        virtual void UnlockObject(const CacheObject* objectPtr);
00029 
00030 protected:
00034        void CleanElementList();
00035        
00036        // abstract methods
00041        virtual double CalcCacheObject(
00042                             const Key& key,
00043                             const SourceObject& source,
00044                             CacheObject& cache) const = 0;
00045        virtual const SourceObject* LockSourceObject(const Key& key) = 0;
00046        virtual void UnlockSourceObject(const Key& key, const SourceObject* sourcePtr) = 0;
00047 
00048 private:
00049        double m_maxCumulatedWeight;
00050 
00051        mutable double m_cumulatedWeight;
00052 
00053        struct ListElement
00054        {
00055               bool operator==(const Key& key)
00056               {
00057                      return this->key == key;
00058               }
00059 
00060               Key key;
00061               double weight;
00062               istd::TDelPtr<CacheObject> objectPtr;
00063               int lockedCount;
00064        };
00065 
00066        typedef QList<ListElement> CachedList;
00067 
00068        CachedList m_cachedList;
00069 };

00074 template <class Key, class CacheObject, class SourceObject>
00075 TMorphLockedProducerBase<Key, CacheObject, SourceObject>::TMorphLockedProducerBase()
00076 :      m_maxCumulatedWeight(10), m_cumulatedWeight(0)
00077 {
00078 }

00081 template <class Key, class CacheObject, class SourceObject>
00082 double TMorphLockedProducerBase<Key, CacheObject, SourceObject>::GetMaxCumulatedWeight() const
00083 {
00084        return m_maxCumulatedWeight;
00085 }

00087 
00088 template <class Key, class CacheObject, class SourceObject>
00089 void TMorphLockedProducerBase<Key, CacheObject, SourceObject>::SetMaxCumulatedWeight(double value)
00090 {
00091        m_maxCumulatedWeight = value;
00092 
00093        CleanElementList();
00094 }

00097 // reimplemented (iproc::TILockedProducer)

00099 template <class Key, class CacheObject, class SourceObject>
00100 const CacheObject* TMorphLockedProducerBase<Key, CacheObject, SourceObject>::ProduceLockedObject(const Key& key)
00101 {
00102        typename CachedList::iterator foundIter = qFind(m_cachedList.begin(), m_cachedList.end(), key);
00103        if (foundIter != m_cachedList.end()){
00104               foundIter->lockedCount++;
00105 
00106               return foundIter->objectPtr.GetPtr();
00107        }
00108 
00109        const SourceObject* sourcePtr = LockSourceObject(key);
00110        if (sourcePtr != NULL){
00111               istd::TDelPtr<CacheObject> newObjectPtr(new CacheObject);
00112               if (!newObjectPtr.IsValid()){
00113                      return NULL;
00114               }
00115 
00116               double weight = CalcCacheObject(key, *sourcePtr, *newObjectPtr);
00117 
00118               UnlockSourceObject(key, sourcePtr);
00119 
00120               if (weight < 0){
00121                      return NULL;
00122               }
00123 
00124               m_cachedList.push_back(ListElement());
00125 
00126               ListElement& element = m_cachedList.back();
00127 
00128               element.key = key;
00129               element.objectPtr.TakeOver(newObjectPtr);
00130               element.weight = weight;
00131               element.lockedCount = 1;
00132 
00133               m_cumulatedWeight += weight;
00134 
00135               CleanElementList();
00136 
00137               return element.objectPtr.GetPtr();
00138        }
00139 
00140        return NULL;
00141 }
00142 
00143 
00144 template <class Key, class CacheObject, class SourceObject>
00145 void TMorphLockedProducerBase<Key, CacheObject, SourceObject>::UnlockObject(const CacheObject* objectPtr)
00146 {
00147        for (         typename CachedList::iterator iter = m_cachedList.begin();
00148                             iter != m_cachedList.end();
00149                             ++iter){
00150               if (iter->objectPtr.GetPtr() == objectPtr){
00151                      if (--iter->lockedCount <= 0){
00152                             m_cachedList.erase(iter);
00153                      }
00154 
00155                      break;
00156               }
00157        }
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 // protected methods
00162 
00163 template <class Key, class CacheObject, class SourceObject>
00164 void TMorphLockedProducerBase<Key, CacheObject, SourceObject>::CleanElementList()
00165 {
00166        typename CachedList::iterator iter = m_cachedList.begin();
00167        while (              (m_cumulatedWeight > m_maxCumulatedWeight) &&
00168                             (iter != m_cachedList.end())){
00169               if (iter->lockedCount <= 0){
00170                      m_cumulatedWeight -= iter->weight;
00171 
00172                      iter = m_cachedList.erase(iter);
00173               }
00174               else{
00175                      ++iter;
00176               }
00177        }
00178 }
